public method Multiple::choose2 (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in choose2: 7
sub choose2 {
    my $self = shift;
    my @input = @_;

    $self->getRandoms(scalar(@{ $self->{answers} }), @input);
    $self->selectQA();
}

public method Multiple::correct_ans (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in correct_ans: 7
sub correct_ans {
    my $self = shift;
    my @ans = &ChoiceList::ALPHABET( sort { $a <=> $b } @{$self->{inverted_shuffle}} );

    #radio_cmp and checkbox_cmp expect a string, not a reference to an array like str_cmp, etc
    join "", @ans;
}
public method Multiple::extra (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in extra: 9
sub extra {
    my $self = shift;
    my @input = @_;

    push( @{ $self->{extras} }, @input);

    #call as a method of $self
    &ChoiceList::choose_extra($self, scalar(@{ $self->{extras} }));
}

# Number of lines of code in print_q: 5
sub print_q {
    my $self = shift;

    @{ $self->{questions} }[0];
}
public method Multiple::qa (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in qa: 9
sub qa {
    my $self = shift;
    my @input = @_;

    push( @{ $self->{questions} }, shift(@input) ); #one question
    push( @{ $self->{answers} }, @input );  #correct answer(s)

    $self->choose2(scalar(@{ $self->{answers} }));
}
public method Multiple::ra_correct_ans (  ) 

Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in ra_correct_ans: 3
sub ra_correct_ans {
    warn "Multiple does not use ra_correct_ans because radio_cmp and checkbox_cmp expect a string.\nYou should use correct_ans instead.";
}
public method Multiple::selectQA (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in selectQA: 7
sub selectQA {
    my $self = shift;

    $self->{selected_q} = $self->{questions};
    $self->{selected_a} = [ @{ $self->{answers} }[@{ $self->{shuffle} }] ];
    $self->{inverted_shuffle} = [ &ChoiceList::invert(@{ $self->{shuffle} }) ];
}
